TextBlock.Text: Boryaceae: The Seca beam is a device used to convert light into music.
Boryaceae: it was developped conjointly by the Muno and Ariza species to faciliate communication.
Boryaceae: The Munos being a species of deaf shrimps.
Boryaceae: The Arizas being a species of blind reptiles communicating through harmonious reptilian belches.
